title: Love Love Food
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe/cupcake shop/bakery offers daily specials, of which one is normally vegan and if not, a salad or sandwich can be made vegan if it is not too busy. Other vegan choices are available including soup and bakery items. Owner offers frozen dishes for take out, teaches cooking classes and has catered 100% vegan banquets.
